### Logs

```{r}
datereq <- Sys.time()
datereqISO <- datereq |> format("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
datereqFR <- datereq |> format("%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S")
userId <- Sys.getenv("LOGNAME")
osType <- .Platform$OS.type
rVersion <- R.version$version.string
rNickname <- R.version$nickname
running <- sessionInfo()$running

dflogs <- 
	data.frame(
	"indic" = c("date",
							"utilisateur",
							"type d'OS",
							"running on",
							"R",
							"Nick"
							),
	"val" = c(datereqISO,
						userId,
						osType,
						running,
						rVersion,
						rNickname))

dflogs |> 
	knitr::kable()
```
